words.translation: Ta Seem Meem

translations.1: Taa-Seeen-Meeem

words.translation: These|(are the) Verses|(of) the Book|the clear

translations.1: Tilka Aayaatul Kitaabil mubeen

words.translation: We recite|to you|from|(the) news|(of) Musa|and Firaun|in truth|for a people|who believe

translations.1: Natloo 'alaika min naba-i Moosaa Wa-Fir'awna bilhaqqi liqawminy yu'miinoon

words.translation: Indeed|Firaun|exalted himself|in|the land|and made|its people|(into) sects|oppressing|a group|among them|slaughtering|their sons|and letting live|their women|Indeed he|was|of|the corrupters

translations.1: Inna Fir'awna 'alaa fil ardi Wa-ja'ala ahlahaa shiya'ai yastad'ifu taaa'ifatam minhum yuzabbihu abnaaa'ahum Wa-yastahyee nisaaa'ahum; innahoo kaana minal mufsideen

words.translation: And We wanted|to|bestow a favor|upon|those who|were oppressed|in|the land|and make them|leaders|and make them|the inheritors

translations.1: Wa-nureedu an namunna 'alal lazeenas tud'ifoo fil ardi Wa-naj'alahum a'immatanw Wa-naj'alahumul waariseen

words.translation: And [We] establish|them|in|the land|and show|Firaun|and Haman|and their hosts|through them|what|they were|fearing

translations.1: Wa-numakkina lahum fil ardi Wa-nuriya Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junoodahumaa minhum maa kaanoo yahzaroon

words.translation: And We inspired|[to]|(the) mother|(of) Musa|that|Suckle him|but when|you fear|for him|then cast him|in(to)|the river|and (do) not|fear|and (do) not|grieve|Indeed We|(will) restore him|to you|and (will) make him|of|the Messengers

translations.1: Wa-awhainaaa ilaaa ummi Moosaaa an ardi'eehi faizaa khifti 'alaihi fa-alqeehi fil yammi Wa-laa takhaafee Wa-laa tahzaneee innaa raaaddoohu ilaiki Wa-jaa'iloohu minal mursaleen

words.translation: Then picked him up|(the) family|(of) Firaun|so that he might become|to them|an enemy|and a grief|Indeed|Firaun|and Haman|and their hosts|were|sinners

translations.1: Faltaqatahooo Aalu Fir'awna li-yakoona lahum 'aduwwanw Wa-hazanaa; inna Fir'awna Wa-Haamaana Wa-junooda-humaa kaanoo khaati'een

words.translation: And said|(the) wife|(of) Firaun|A comfort|(of the) eye|for me|and for you|(Do) not|kill him|perhaps|(that)|he may benefit us|or|we may take him|(as) a son|And they|(did) not|perceive

translations.1: Wa-qaalatim ra-atu Fir'awna qurratu 'aynil lee Wa-lak; laa taqtuloohu 'asaaa aien yanfa'anaa aw nattakhizahoo waladanw Wa-hum laa yash'uroon

words.translation: And became|(the) heart|(of the) mother|(of) Musa|empty|That|she was near|(to) disclosing|about him|if not|that|We strengthened|[over]|her heart|so that she would be|of|the believers

translations.1: Wa-asbaha fu'aadu ummi Moosaa faarighan in kaadat latubdee bihee law laaa arrabatnaa 'alaa qalbihaa litakoona minal mu'mineen

words.translation: And she said|to his sister|Follow him|So she watched|him|from|a distance|while they|(did) not|perceive

translations.1: Wa-qaalat li-ukhtihee qusseehi fabasurat bihee 'an junubinw wahum laa yash'uroon

words.translation: And We had forbidden|for him|the wet nurses|before|before|so she said|Shall I|direct you|to|(the) people|(of) a house|who will rear him|for you|while they|to him|(will be) sincere

translations.1: Wa-harramnaa 'alaihil maraadi'a min qablu faqaalat hal adullukum 'alaaa ahli baitiny yakfuloonahoo lakum Wa-hum lahoo naasihoon

words.translation: So We restored him|to|his mother|that|might be comforted|her eye|and not|she may grieve|and that she would know|that|the Promise of Allah|the Promise of Allah|(is) true|But|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Faradadnaahu ilaa ummihee kai taqarra 'ainuhaa Wa-laa tahzana Wa-lita'lama anna wa'dal laahi haqqunw Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

words.translation: And when|he reached|his full strength|and became mature|We bestowed upon him|wisdom|and knowledge|And thus|We reward|the good-doers

translations.1: Wa-lammaa balagha ashuddahoo wastawaaa aatai-naahu hukmanw Wa-'ilmaa; Wa-kazaalika najzil muhsineen

words.translation: And he entered|the city|at|a time|(of) inattention|of|its people|and found|therein|two men|fighting each other|this|of|his party|and this|of|his enemy|And called him for help|the one who|(was) from|his party|against|the one who|(was) from|his enemy|so struck him with his fist|Musa|and killed him|and killed him|He said|This (is)|of|(the) deed|(of) Shaitaan|Indeed, he|(is) an enemy|one who misleads|clearly

translations.1: Wa-dakhalal madeenata 'alaa heene ghaflatim min ahlihaa fawajada feeha raju-laini yaqtatilaani haazaa min shee'atihee Wa-haaza min 'aduwwihee fastaghaasahul lazee min shee'atihee 'alal lazee min 'aduwwihee fawakazahoo Moosaa faqadaa 'alaihi qaala haaza min 'amalish Shaitaani innahoo 'aduwwum mmudillum mubeen

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Indeed I|[I] have wronged|my soul|so forgive|[for] me|Then He forgave|[for] him|Indeed He|He (is)|the Oft-Forgiving|the Most Merciful

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi innee zalamtu nafsee faghfir lee faghafara lah; innahoo Huwal Ghafoorur Raheem

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Because|You have favored|[on] me|so not|I will be|a supporter|(of) the criminals

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi bimaaa an'amta 'alaiya falan akoona zaheeral lilmujrimeen

words.translation: In the morning he was|in|the city|fearful|(and) was vigilant|when behold!|The one who|sought his help|the previous day|cried out to him for help|Said|to him|Musa|Indeed you|(are) surely a deviator|clear

translations.1: Fa-asbaha fil madeenati khaaa'ifaien yataraqqabu fa-izal lazis tansarahoo bil-amsi yastasrikhuh; qaala lahoo moosaaa innaka laghawiyyum mubeen

words.translation: Then when|[that]|he wanted|to|strike|the one who|[he] (was)|an enemy|to both of them|he said|O Musa!|Do you intend|to|kill me|as|you killed|a person|yesterday|Not|you want|but|that|you become|a tyrant|in|the earth|and not|you want|that|you be|of|the reformers

translations.1: Falammaaa an araada aien yabtisha billazee huwa 'aduwwul lahumaa qaala yaa-Moosaaa atureedu an taqtulanee kamaa qatalta nafsam bil-amsi in tureedu illaaa an takoona jabbaaram fil ardi Wa-maa tureedu an takoona minal musliheen

words.translation: And came|a man|from|(the) farthest end|(of) the city|running|He said|O Musa!|Indeed|the chiefs|are taking counsel|about you|to kill you|so leave|indeed I am|to you|of|the sincere advisors

translations.1: Wa-jaaa'a rajulum min aqsal madeenati yas'aa qaala yaa-Moosaaa innal mala-a yaa-tamiroona bika liyaqtulooka fakhruj innee laka minan naasiheen

words.translation: So he left|from it|fearing|(and) vigilant|He said|My Lord!|Save me|from|the people|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Fakharaja minhaa khaaa 'ifany-yataraqqab; qaala Rabbi najjinee minal qawmiz zaalimeen

words.translation: And when|he turned his face|towards|Madyan|he said|Perhaps|my Lord|[that]|will guide me|(to the) sound|way

translations.1: Wa-lammaa tawajjaha tilqaaa'a Madyana qaala 'asaa Rabbeee aien yahdiyanee Sawaaa'as Sabeel

words.translation: And when|he came|(to the) water|(of) Madyan|he found|on it|a group|of|men|watering|and he found|besides them|besides them|two women|keeping back|He said|What|(is the) matter with both of you|They said|We cannot water|We cannot water|until|take away|the shepherds|and our father|(is) a very old man|(is) a very old man

translations.1: Wa-lammaa warada maaa'a Madyana wajada 'alaihi ummatam minannaasi yasqoona Wa-wajada min doonihimum ra ataini tazoodaani qaala maa khatubkumaa qaalataa laa nasqee hataa yusdirar ri'aaa'u Wa-aboonaa shaikhun kabeer

words.translation: So he watered|for them|Then|he turned back|to|the shade|and said|My Lord!|Indeed I am|of whatever|You send|to me|of|good|(in) need

translations.1: Fasaqaa lahumaa summa tawallaaa ilaz zilli faqaala Rabbi innee limaaa anzalta ilaiya min khairin faqeer

words.translation: Then came to him|one of the two women|walking|with|shyness|She said|Indeed|my father|calls you|that he may reward you|(the) reward|(for) what|you watered|for us|So when|he came to him|and narrated|to him|the story|he said|(Do) not|fear|You have escaped|from|the people|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Fajaaa'at-hu ihdaahumaa tamshee 'alas tihyaaa'in qaalat inna abee yad'ooka li-yajziyaka ajra maa saqaita lanaa; falammaa jaaa'ahoo Wa-qassa 'alaihil qasasa qaala laa takhaf najawta minal qawmiz zaalimeen

words.translation: Said|one of them|O my father!|Hire him|Indeed|(the) best|whom|you (can) hire|(is) the strong|the trustworthy

translations.1: Qaalat ihdaahumaa yaaa abatis taajirhu inna khaira manistaajartal qawiyyul ameen

words.translation: He said|Indeed, I|[I] wish|to|marry you to|one|(of) my daughters|(of) these two|on|that|you serve me|(for) eight|years|but if|you complete|ten|then from|you|And not|I wish|to|make it difficult|for you|You will find me|if|Allah wills|Allah wills|of|the righteous

translations.1: Qaala innee ureedu an unkihaka ihdab nataiya haataini 'alaaa an taajuranee samaaniya hijaj; fa-in atmamta 'ashran famin 'indika Wa-maaa ureedu an ashuqqa 'alaik; satajiduneee in shaaa'al laahu minas saaliheen

words.translation: He said|That|(is) between me|and between you|Whichever|(of) the two terms|I complete|then no|injustice|to me|and Allah|over|what|we say|(is) a Witness

translations.1: Qaala zaalika bainee Wa-bainaka aiyamal ajalaini qadaitu falaa 'udwaana 'alaiya wallaahu 'alaa ma naqoolu Wakeel

words.translation: Then when|Musa fulfilled|Musa fulfilled|the term|and was traveling|with his family|he saw|in|(the) direction|(of) Mount Tur|a fire|He said|to his family|Stay here|indeed, I|[I] perceive|a fire|Perhaps|I will bring you|from there|some information|or|a burning wood|from|the fire|so that you may|warm yourselves

translations.1: Falammmaa qadaa Moosal ajala Wa-saara bi-ahliheee aanasa min jaanibit Toori naaran qaala li-ahlihim kusooo inneee aanastu naaral la-'alleee aateekum minhaa bikhabarin aw jazwatim minan naari la-'allakum tastaloon

words.translation: But when|he came (to) it|he was called|from|(the) side|(of) the valley|the right|in|the place even|blessed|from|the tree|that|O Musa!|Indeed|I Am|Allah|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Falammaaa ataahaa noodiya min shaati'il waadil aimani fil buq'atil muubaarakati minash shajarati aien yaa-Moosaaa inneee Anal laahu Rabbul 'aalameen

words.translation: And [that]|throw|your staff|But when|he saw it|moving|as if it|(were) a snake|he turned|(in) flight|and (did) not|return|O Musa!|Draw near|and (do) not|fear|Indeed you|(are) of|the secure

translations.1: Wa-an alqi 'asaaka falam-maa ra-aahaa tahtazzu ka-annnahaa jaaannunw wallaa mudbiranw Wa-lam yu'aqqib; yaa-Moosaa aqbil Wa-laa takhaf innaka minal aamineen

words.translation: Insert|your hand|in|your bosom|it will come forth|white|without|without|any harm|And draw|to yourselves|your hand|against|fear|So these|(are) two evidences|from|your Lord|to|Firaun|and his chiefs|Indeed, they|are|a people|defiantly disobedient

translations.1: Usluk yadaka fee jaibika takhruj baidaaa'a min ghairi sooo'inw wadmum ilaika janaahaka minar rahbi fazaanika burhaanaani mir Rabbika ilaa Fir'awna Wa-mala'ih; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Indeed|I killed|of them|a man|and I fear|that|they will kill me

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi innee qataltu minhum nafsan fa-akhaafu aien yaqtuloon

words.translation: And my brother|Harun|he|(is) more eloquent|than me|(in) speech|so send him|with me|(as) a helper|who will confirm me|Indeed|I fear|that|they will deny me

translations.1: Wa-akhee Haaroonu huwa afsahu minnee lisaanan fa-arsilhu ma'iya rid-aien yusaddiquneee innee akhaafu aien yukazziboon

words.translation: He said|We will strengthen|your arm|through your brother|and We will make|for both of you|an authority|so not|they will reach|to both of you|Through Our Signs|you two|and (those) who|follow you|(will) be the dominant

translations.1: Qaala sanashuddu 'adudaka bi-akheeka Wa-naj'alu lakumaa sultaanan falaa yasiloona ilaikumaa; bi-Aayaatinaa antumaa Wa-manit taba'akumal ghaaliboon

words.translation: But when|came to them|Musa|with Our Signs|clear|they said|Not|(is) this|except|a magic|invented|and not|we heard|of this|among|our forefathers|our forefathers

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'ahum Moosaa bi-Aayaatinaa baiyinaatin qaaloo maa haazaaa illaa sihrum muftaranw Wa-maa sami'naa bihaazaa feee aabaaa'inal awwaleen

words.translation: And Musa said|And Musa said|My Lord|knows best|of who|has come|with [the] guidance|from Him|from Him|and who|will be|for him|the good end in the Hereafter|the good end in the Hereafter|Indeed|not|will be successful|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-qaala Moosaa Rabbeee a'alamu biman jaaa'a bilhudaa min 'indihee Wa-man takoonu lahoo 'aaqibatud daari innahoo laa yuflihuz zaalimoon

words.translation: And Firaun said|And Firaun said|O chiefs|O chiefs|Not|I know|for you|any|god|other than me|So kindle|for me|O Haman|Upon|the clay|and make|for me|a lofty tower|so that [I]|I may look|at|(the) God|(of) Musa|And indeed, I|[I] think that he|(is) of|the liars

translations.1: Wa-qaala Fir'awnu yaaa-aiyyuhal mala-u maa 'alimtu lakum min ilaahin ghairee fa-awqid lee yaa-Haamaanu 'alatteeni faj'al lee sarhal la'alleee attali'u ilaaa ilaahi Moosaa Wa-innee la azunnuhoo minal kaazibeen

words.translation: And he was arrogant|And he was arrogant|and his hosts|in|the land|without|right|and they thought|that they|to Us|not|will be returned

translations.1: Wastakbara huwa Wa-junooduhoo fil ardi bighairil haqqi Wa-zannooo annahum ilainaa laa yurja'oon

words.translation: So We seized him|and his hosts|and We threw them|in|the sea|So see|how|was|(the) end|(of) the wrongdoers

translations.1: Fa-akhaznaahu Wa-junoo-dahoo fanabaznaahum fil yammi fanzur kaifa kaana 'aaqibatuz zaalimeen

words.translation: And We made them|leaders|inviting|to|the Fire|and (on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|not|they will be helped

translations.1: Wa-ja'alnaahum a'immataien yad'oona ilan Naari Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati laa yunsaroon

words.translation: And We caused to follow them|in|this|world|a curse|and (on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|they|(will be) of|the despised

translations.1: Wa-atba'naahum fee haazihid dunyaa la'natanw Wa-Yawmal Qiyaamati hum minal maqbooheen

words.translation: And verily|We gave|Musa|the Scripture|after [what]|after [what]|after [what]|We had destroyed|the generations|former|(as) an enlightenment|for the mankind|and a guidance|and mercy|that they may|remember

translations.1: Wa-laqad aatainaa Moosal Kitaaba mim ba'di maaa ahlaknal quroonal oolaa basaaa'ira linnaasi Wa-hudanw Wa-rahmatal la'allahum yata-zakkkaroon

words.translation: And not|you were|on (the) side|western|when|We decreed|to|Musa|the Commandment|and not|you were|among|the witnesses

translations.1: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibil gharbiyyi iz qadainaaa ilaa Moosal amra Wa-maa kunta minash shaahideen

words.translation: But We|[We] produced|generations|and prolonged|for them|the life|And not|you were|a dweller|among|(the) people|(of) Madyan|reciting|to them|Our Verses|but We|[We] were|the Senders

translations.1: Wa-laakinnaa anshaanaa quroonan fatataawala 'alaihimul 'umur; Wa-maa kunta saawiyan feee ahli Madyana tatloo 'alaihim Aayaatinaa Wa-laakinnaa kunnaa mursileen

words.translation: And not|you were|at (the) side|(of) the Tur|when|We called|But|(as) a mercy|from|your Lord|so that you warn|a people|not|(had) come to them|any|warner|before you|before you|so that they may|remember

translations.1: Wa-maa kunta bijaanibit Toori iz naadainaa Wa-laakir rahmatam mir Rabbika litunzira qawmam maaa ataahum min nazeerim min qablika la'allahum yatazakkaroon

words.translation: And if not|[that]|struck them|a disaster|for what|had sent forth|their hands|and they would say|Our Lord!|Why not|You sent|to us|a Messenger|so we (could have) followed|Your Verses|and we (would) have been|of|the believers

translations.1: Wa-law-laaa an tuseebahum museebatum bimaa qaddamat aideehim fa-yaqooloo Rabbanaa law-laaa arsalta ilainaa Rasoolan fanattabi'a Aayaatika Wa-nakoona minal mu'mineen

words.translation: But when|came to them|the truth|from Us|from Us|they said|Why not|he was given|(the) like|(of) what|was given|(to) Musa|Did not|they disbelieve|in what|was given|(to) Musa|before|before|They said|Two magic (works)|supporting each other|And they said|Indeed, we|in all|(are) disbelievers

translations.1: Falammaa jaaa'ahumul haqqu min 'indinaa qaaloo law-laa ootiya misla maaa ootiyaa Moosaa; awalam yakfuroo bimaaa ootiya Moosaa min qablu qaaloo sihraani tazaaharaa Wa-qaalooo innaa bikullin kaafiroon

words.translation: Say|Then bring|a Book|from Allah|from Allah|from Allah|which|(is) a better guide|than both of them|that I may follow it|if|you are|truthful

translations.1: Qul faatoo bi-Kitaabim min 'indil laahi huwa ahdaa minhu-maaa attabi'hu in kuntum saadiqeen

words.translation: But if|not|they respond|to you|then know|that only|they follow|their desires|And who|(is) more astray|than (one) who|follows|his own desire|without|guidance|from|Allah|Indeed|Allah|(does) not|guide|the people|the wrongdoers

translations.1: Fa-il lam yastajeeboo laka fa'lam annamaa yattabi'oona ahwaaa'ahum; Wa-man adallu mimmanit taba'a hawaahu bighari hudam minal laah; innal laaha laa yahdil qawmaz zaalimeen

words.translation: And indeed|We have conveyed|to them|the Word|so that they may|remember

translations.1: Wa-laqad wassalnaa lahumul qawla la'allahum yatazakkaroon

words.translation: Those who|We gave them|the Scripture|before it|before it|they|in it|believe

translations.1: Allazeena aatainaahu-mul Kitaaba min qablihee hum bihee yu'minoon

words.translation: And when|it is recited|to them|they say|We believe|in it|Indeed, it|(is) the truth|from|our Lord|Indeed, we|[we] were|before it|before it|Muslims

translations.1: Wa-izaa yutlaa 'alaihim qaaloo aamannaa biheee innahul haqqu mir rabbinaaa innaa kunnaa min qablihee muslimeen

words.translation: Those|will be given|their reward|twice|because|they are patient|and they repel|with good|the evil|and from what|We have provided them|they spend

translations.1: Ulaaa'ika yu'tawna ajrahum marratayni bimaa sabaroo Wa-yadra'oona bil-hasanatis saiyyi'ata Wa-mimmmaa razaq-naahum yunfiqoon

words.translation: And when|they hear|vain talk|they turn away|from it|and say|For us|our deeds|and for you|your deeds|Peace (be)|on you|not|we seek|the ignorant

translations.1: Wa-izaa sami'ul laghwa a'radoo 'anhu Wa-qaaloo lanaaa a'maalunaa Wa-lakum a'maalukum salaamun 'alaikum laa nabtaghil jaahileen

words.translation: Indeed you|(can) not|guide|whom|you love|but|Allah|guides|whom|He wills|And He|(is) most knowing|(of) the guided ones

translations.1: Innaka laa tahdee man ahbata Wa-laakinna laaha yahdee maien yashaaa'; Wa-Huwaa 'lamu bilmuhtadeen

words.translation: And they say|If|we follow|the guidance|with you|we would be swept|from|our land|Have not|We established|for them|a sanctuary|secure|are brought|to it|fruits|(of) all|things|a provision|from|Us|But|most of them|(do) not|know

translations.1: Wa-qaalooo in nattabi'il hudaa ma'aka nutakhattaf min ardinaa; awalam numakkkil lahum haraman aaminany yujbaaa ilaihi samaraatu kulli shai'ir rizqam mil ladunnaa Wa-laakinna aksarahum laa ya'lamoon

words.translation: And how many|We have destroyed|of|a town|which exulted|(in) its means of livelihood|And these|(are) their dwellings|not|have been inhabited|after them|after them|except|a little|And indeed, [We]|We|(are) the inheritors

translations.1: Wa-kam ahlaknaa min qaryatim batirat ma'eeshatahaa fatilka masaakinuhum lam tuskam mim ba'dihim illaa qaleelaa; Wa-kunnaa Nahnul waariseen

words.translation: And not|was|your Lord|(the) one to destroy|the towns|until|He (had) sent|in|their mother (town)|a Messenger|reciting|to them|Our Verses|And not|We would be|(the) one to destroy|the towns|except|while their people|(were) wrongdoers

translations.1: Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka muhlikal quraa hattaa yab'asa feee ummihaa Rasoolany yatloo 'alaihim aayaatina; Wa-maa kunnaa muhlikil quraaa illaa Wa-ahluhaa zaalimoon

words.translation: And whatever|you have been given|from|things|(is) an enjoyment|(of the) life|(of) the world|and its adornment|And what|(is) with|Allah|(is) better|and more lasting|So (will) not|you use intellect

translations.1: Wa-maaa ooteetum min shai'in famataa'ul hayaatid dunyaa Wa-zeenatuhaa; Wa-maa 'indal laahi khairunw Wa-abqaa; afalaa ta'qiloon

words.translation: Then is (he) whom|We have promised him|a promise|good|and he|(will) meet it|like (the one) whom|We provided him|enjoyment|(of the) life|(of) the world|then|he|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|(will be) among|those presented

translations.1: Afamanw wa'adnaahu wa'dan hasanan fahuwa laaqeehi kamam matta'naahu mataa'al hayaatid dunyaa summa huwa Yawmal Qiyaamati minal muhdareen

words.translation: And (the) Day|He will call them|and say|Where|(are) My partners|whom|you used (to)|claim

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa-'iyal lazeena kuntum taz'umoon

words.translation: (Will) say|those|(has) come true|against whom|the Word|Our Lord|These|(are) those whom|we led astray|We led them astray|as|we were astray|We declare our innocence|before You|Not|they used (to)|worship us|worship us

translations.1: Qaalal lazeena haqqa 'alaihimul qawlu Rabbanaa haaa'ulaaa'il lazeena aghwainaa aghwainaahu kamaa ghawainaa tabarraanaaa ilaika maa kaanoo iyyaanaa ya'budoon

words.translation: And it will be said|Call|your partners|And they will call them|but not|they will respond|to them|and they will see|the punishment|If only|[that] they|had been|guided!

translations.1: Wa-qeelad 'oo shurakaaa'akum fada'awhum falam yastajeeboo lahum Wa-ra-awul 'azaab; law annahum kaanoo yahtadoon

words.translation: And (the) Day|He will call them|and say|What|did you answer|the Messengers

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu maazaaa ajabtumul mursaleen

words.translation: But (will) be obscure|to them|the information|that day|so they|will not ask one another|will not ask one another

translations.1: Fa'amiyat 'alaihimul ambaaa'u Yawma'izin fahum laa yatasaaa'aloon

words.translation: But as for|(him) who|repented|and believed|and did|righteousness|then perhaps|[that]|he will be|of|the successful ones

translations.1: Fa-ammaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa'asaaa ai yakoona minal mufliheen

words.translation: And your Lord|creates|what|He wills|and chooses|Not|they have|for them|the choice|Glory be|(to) Allah|and High is He|above what|they associate (with Him)

translations.1: Wa-Rabbuka yakhuluqu maa yashaaa'u Wa-yakhtaar; maa kaana lahumul khiyarah; Subhannal laahi Wa-Ta'aalaa 'ammmaa yushrikoon

words.translation: And your Lord|knows|what|conceals|their breasts|and what|they declare

translations.1: Wa-Rabbuka ya'lamu maa tukinnu sudooruhum Wa-maa yu'linoon

words.translation: And He|(is) Allah|(there is) no|god|but|He|To Him|(are due) all praises|in|the first|and the last|And for Him|(is) the Decision|and to Him|you will be returned

translations.1: Wa-Huwal laahu laaa ilaaha illaa Huwa lahul hamdu fil oolaa wal-Aakhirati Wa-lahul hukmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon

words.translation: Say|Have you seen|if|Allah made|Allah made|for you|the night|continuous|till|(the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|who|(is the) god|besides|Allah|who could bring you|light|Then will not|you hear

translations.1: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumul laila sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaa-teekum bidiyaaa'in afalaa tasma'oon

words.translation: Say|Have you seen|if|Allah made|Allah made|for you|the day|continuous|till|(the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|who|(is the) god|besides|Allah|who could bring you|night|(for) you (to) rest|in it|Then will not|you see

translations.1: Qul ara'aitum in ja'alal laahu 'alaikumun nahaara sarmadan ilaa Yawmil Qiyaamati man ilaahun ghairul laahi yaateekum bilailin taskunoona feehi afalaa tubsiroon

words.translation: And from|His Mercy|He made|for you|the night|and the day|that you may rest|therein|and that you may seek|from|His Bounty|and so that you may|be grateful

translations.1: Wa-mir rahmatihee ja'ala lakumul laila wannahaara litaskunoo feehi Wa-litabtaghoo min fadlihee Wa-la'allakum tashkuroon

words.translation: And (the) Day|He will call them|and say|Where|(are) My partners|whom|you used (to)|claim

translations.1: Wa-Yawma yunaadeehim fa-yaqoolu aina shurakaaa'iyal lazeena kuntum tazz'umoon

words.translation: And We will draw forth|from|every|nation|a witness|and We will say|Bring|your proof|Then they will know|that|the truth|(is) for Allah|and (will be) lost|from them|what|they used (to)|invent

translations.1: Wa-naza'naa min kulli ummatin shaheedan faqulnaa haatoo burhaanakum fa'alimooo annal haqqa lillaahi Wa-dalla 'anhum maa kaanoo yaftaroon

words.translation: Indeed|Qarun|was|from|(the) people|(of) Musa|but he oppressed|[on] them|And We gave him|of|the treasures|which|indeed|(the) keys of it|would burden|a company (of men)|possessors of great strength|possessors of great strength|When|said|to him|his people|(Do) not|exult|Indeed|Allah|(does) not|love|the exultant

translations.1: Inna Qaaroona kaana min qawmi Moosaa fabaghaaa 'alaihim Wa-aatainaahu minal kunoozi maaa inna mafaati-hahoo latanooo'u bil'usbati ulil quwwati iz qaala lahoo qawmuhoo laa tafrah innal laahaa laa yuhibbul fariheen

words.translation: But seek|through what|Allah has given you|Allah has given you|the home|(of) the Hereafter|and (do) not|forget|your share|of|the world|And do good|as|Allah has been good|Allah has been good|to you|And (do) not|seek|corruption|in|the earth|Indeed|Allah|(does) not|love|the corrupters

translations.1: Wabtaghi feemaaa aataakal laahud Daaral Aakhirata Wa-laa tansa naseebaka minad dunyaa Wa-ahsin kamaaa ahsanal laahu ilaika Wa-laa tabghil fasaada fil ardi innal laaha laa yuhibbul mufsideen

words.translation: He said|Only|I have been given it|on (account)|(of) knowledge|I have|Did not|he know|that|Allah|indeed|destroyed|before him|before him|of|the generations|who|[they]|(were) stronger|than him|(in) strength|and greater|(in) accumulation|And not|will be questioned|about|their sins|the criminals

translations.1: Qaala innamaaa ootee-tuhoo 'alaa 'ilmin 'indeee; awalam ya'lam annal laaha qad ahlaka min qablihee minal qurooni man huwa ashaddu minhu quwwatanw Wa-aksaru jam'aa; Wa-laa yus'alu 'an zunoobihimul mujrimoon

words.translation: So he went forth|to|his people|in|his adornment|Said|those who|desire|the life|(of) the world|O! Would that|for us|(the) like|(of) what|has been given|(to) Qarun|Indeed he|(is the) owner|(of) fortune|great

translations.1: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee fee zeenatih; qaalal lazeena yureedoonal hayaatad dunyaa yaalaita lanaa misla maaa ootiya Qaaroonu innahoo lazoo hazzin 'azeem

words.translation: But said|those who|were given|the knowledge|Woe to you!|(The) reward|(of) Allah|(is) better|for (he) who|believes|and does|righteous (deeds)|And not|it is granted|except|(to) the patient ones

translations.1: Wa-qaalal lazeena ootul 'ilma wailakum sawaabul laahi khairul liman aamana Wa-'amila saalihaa; Wa-laa yulaq-qaahaaa illas saabiroon

words.translation: Then We caused to swallow up|him|and his home|the earth|Then not|was|for him|any|group|(to) help him|besides|besides|Allah|and not|was|(he) of|those who (could) defend themselves

translations.1: Fakhasafnaa bihee Wa-bidaarihil arda famaa kaana laho min fi'atien yansuroo-nahoo min doonil laahi Wa-maa kaana minal muntasireen

words.translation: And began|those who|(had) wished|his position|the day before|(to) say|Ah! That|Allah|extends|the provision|for whom|He wills|of|His slaves|and restricts it|If not|that|Allah had favored|Allah had favored|[to] us|He would have caused it to swallow us|He would have caused it to swallow us|Ah! That|not|will succeed|the disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-asbahal lazeena tamannaw makaanahoo bil-amsi yaqooloona waika-annal laaha yabsutur rizqa limaien ya-shaaa'u min 'ibaadihee Wa-yaqdiru law-laaa am mannal laahu 'alainaa lakhasafa binaa waika-annahoo laa yuflihul kaafiroon

words.translation: That|the Home|(of) the Hereafter|We assign it|to those who|(do) not|desire|exaltedness|in|the earth|and not|corruption|And the good end|(is) for the righteous

translations.1: Tilkad Daarul Aakhiratu naj'aluhaa lillazeena laa yureedoona 'uluwwan fil ardi Wa-laa fasaadaa; wal-'aaqibatu lilmuttaqeen

words.translation: Whoever|comes|with a good (deed)|then for him|(will be) better|than it|and whoever|comes|with an evil (deed)|then not|will be recompensed|those who|do|the evil (deeds)|except|what|they used (to)|do

translations.1: Man jaaa'a bilhasanati falahoo khairum minhaa Wa-man jaaa'a bissaiyi'ati falaa yujzal lazeena 'amilus saiyiaati illaa maa kaanoo ya'maloon

words.translation: Indeed|He Who|ordained|upon you|the Quran|(will) surely take you back|to|a place of return|Say|My Lord|(is) most knowing|(of him) who|comes|with the guidance|and who|he|(is) in|an error|manifest

translations.1: Innal azee farada 'alaikal Qur-aana laraaadduka ilaa ma'aad; qur Rabbeee a'lamu man jjaaa'a bil-hudaa Wa-man huwa fee dalaalim mubeen

words.translation: And not|you were|expecting|that|would be sent down|to you|the Book|except|(as) a mercy|from|your Lord|So (do) not|be|an assistant|to the disbelievers

translations.1: Wa-maa kunta tarjooo aien yulqaaa ilaikal Kitaabu illaa rahmatam mir Rabbika falaa takoonanna zaheeral lilkaafireen

words.translation: And (let) not|avert you|from|(the) Verses|(of) Allah|after|[when]|they have been revealed|to you|And invite (people)|to|your Lord|And (do) not|be|of|the polytheists

translations.1: Wa-laa yasuddunnaka 'an Aayaatil laahi ba'da iz unzilat ilaika wad'u ilaa Rabbika Wa-laa takonanna minal mushrikeen

words.translation: And (do) not|invoke|with|Allah|god|other|(There is) no|god|except|Him|Every|thing|(will be) destroyed|except|His Face|To Him|(is) the Decision|and to Him|you will be returned

translations.1: Wa-laa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhar; laaa ilaaha illaa Hoo; kullu shai'in haalikun illaa Wajhah; lahul hukkmu Wa-ilaihi turja'oon
